mutants.original_line: return ''.join([char for char in phrase if char in vowels or not char.isalpha()])
mutants.mutated_line: return 'MUTATED'.join([char for char in phrase if char in vowels or not char.isalpha()])

mutants.original_line: return ''.join([char for char in phrase if char in vowels or not char.isalpha()])
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join([char for char in phrase if char in vowels and (not char.isalpha())])

mutants.original_line: return ''.join([char for char in phrase if char in vowels or not char.isalpha()])
mutants.mutated_line: return ''.join([char for char in phrase if char not in vowels or not char.isalpha()])
